Metadata.Title: RHSA-2018:1192: rh-perl524-perl security update (Moderate)

Platforms: Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3 EUS
Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 EUS

Metadata.Description:
Perl is a high-level programming language that is commonly used for system administration utilities and web programming.

Security Fix(es):

* perl: heap write overflow in regcomp.c (CVE-2018-6797)

* perl: heap read overflow in regexec.c (CVE-2018-6798)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank Perl 5 Porters for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Brian Carpenter as the original reporter of CVE-2018-6797; and Nguyen Duc Manh as the original reporter of CVE-2018-6798.

Criterions.Comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
